words.source: H1961; KJV: Even those..., ESV: those listed..., NASB: Their numbered men... (all render as 'even those that were' or 'those listed' introducing the total)
H6485; KJV: those that were numbered of them, ESV: those listed, NASB: Their numbered men (focus on 'numbered' or 'listed'/'registered')
H4940; KJV: after their families, ESV: by clans, NASB: by their families (consistent 'families' or 'clans')
H505; KJV: thousand, ESV: thousand, NASB: thousand (dual form as 'thousand' in context, all 'thousand')
H3967; KJV: and two hundred, ESV: two hundred, NASB: two hundred (all 'two hundred')
